name: Inklyo
tag_list: content, content-marketing, content-development, content-outsourcing, content-creation, business-writing, business-writing-services, b2b
overview:
Inklyo Ltd. is an online content development outsourcing and business writing service provider. Built on a sophisticated software platform, Inklyo connects individuals, brands, consultants, and agencies with a team of talented and vetted writers 24 hours a day, 7 days a week via a user-friendly and secure online system.

Inklyo offers six distinct advantages over freelance writing service providers and traditional content brokerages. These advantages include a customized conceptual framework for the collection of client information, a scalable internal workforce management system, stringent quality-assurance measures, standard freelancer non-disclosure agreements, custom billing, and a competitive pricing model. What’s more, the entire workflow process (quoting an order, placing an order, paying for the order, releasing an order to a writer, returning the order to the client) is executed via the Inklyo Platform, providing clients with a convenient hub for all their content development projects.

Inklyo: Ridding the world of bad content since 2012.
